sections.title: Inline Links in Text
sections.text:
This text demonstrates the power of inline links! Click [[entry:welcome:Welcome]] to go to the welcome page, or [[category:getting_started:Getting Started]] to browse the getting started category. You can also use [[entry:crafting_table]] for shorter links.

Inline links work in any text section and can reference [[entry:furnace:furnaces]], [[entry:smoker:smokers]], and [[entry:blast_furnace:blast furnaces]] to help players navigate between related crafting systems.

sections.title: More Link Examples
sections.text:
Here are more examples of inline links: [[entry:furnace:Furnace Guide]], [[entry:examples:Examples]], and [[category:crafting_systems:Crafting Systems]]. The links will appear in blue with underlines and be clickable!

You can also link to specific crafting stations like the [[entry:smithing_table:Smithing Table]] for equipment upgrades, the [[entry:brewing_stand:Brewing Stand]] for potion creation, and the [[entry:stonecutter:Stonecutter]] for architectural elements.

sections.title: Auto-Generated Titles
sections.text:
Notice that the showcase and recipe sections above don't have explicit titles - they're automatically generated from the item names! This makes documentation much easier to write.

The auto-generation system works for all section types, including [[entry:crafting_table:recipes]], [[entry:furnace:showcases]], and [[entry:smithing_table:other content types]]. This feature reduces the need to manually specify titles while maintaining professional-looking documentation.
